Thank you Rudra, I agree completely.


----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, February 02, 2001 12:55 PM
Subject: Re: Suicide King


>     I have something to say and some of you may not want to hear it.
Those
> of you whom I talk to outside of this know my personal opinions but this
is
> not about those.  This is about tact.
>
>     I am a cynic and a skeptic by nature.  I am also emotionally detached
> when it comes to matters of death and opinion.  JP, you made a foolish
> mistake by saying that in front of his friends.  I am not saying you are
> right or wrong, I have no way of knowing.  However this will not be
finished
> until there is mourning, appropriate or not.  And I, for one, do not here
to
> see depressing comments and petty arguments.
>
>     I would like to end this message with one last piece of advice: Do not
> pity those who have died by their own hand, for they no longer must cope
with
> the problems of life.  Pity those who must live with the consequences of
his
> decision.  Pity those who are forced to live with the people who brought
him
> to the point where suicide is possible.  And finally, pity those who
brought
> him to the point where suicide is possible for they will be forever filled
> with guilt for this tragedy.
>
>
>
>
